about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Know more <1/><2>about me</2>
about.content:
Programmer who is passionate about creating websites on the <1>Front-end side and also has solid knowledge in the <2>Back-end side. I am a self-taught developper who is constantly learning about new technologies and that loves <3>designing and sketching interfaces.

I enjoy taking on new challenges that put my capabilities into practice, allowing me to learn new skills.

experiences.title: Fullstack Odoo Developer
experiences.subtitle: Toh Soluciones Digitales
experiences.description: Odoo developer specialized on creating custom systems for companies that use (or want to use) Odoo as their ERP solution. Modules development using Python, Javascript, Bootstrap CSS and XML/HTML for the business logic designing of the companies, API integrations, Landing Pages building and desing/re-desing Odoo graphic interface.

experiences.title: Computer Science Engineering
experiences.subtitle: TECNM Campus Motul
experiences.description: Graduated and titled as Computer Science Engineer. In my journey as student I was part of relevant projects for the university such as LaGranjita Point of Sale, where I put into practice the web programming. I did my professional residence in the company Toh Soluciones Dgitales under the project "Project Management Dashboard" where after 5 months doing the residence there, they hired me.

footballClub.title: Football Club Landing Page
footballClub.description: A template to organice the information about your football club where you can show the incoming matches, table positions, squad, etc.
